content:
ACT
195
Table of Contents
The list will include all immovable and movable things that were in the testator's immediate possession at the time of his death.
The list will also include other things that belonged to the testator and are with another person, with an indication of who they are with and on what basis, as well as what the testator owned, which is claimed not to be his property.
The decedent's claims and debts, and especially unpaid taxes, contributions and other public duties, will be recorded in the list of assets.
